metadata.title: CVE-2020-12403 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way CHACHA20-POLY1305 was implemented in NSS inversions before 3.55. When using multi-part Chacha20, it could causeout-of-bounds reads. This issue was fixed by explicitly disablingmulti-part ChaCha20 (which was not functioning correctly) and strictlyenforcing tag length. The highest threat from this vulnerability is toconfidentiality and system availability.

criterions.comment: nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
